title: Why Is Aquarius So Attracted to Taurus?

steps.title: Aquarius will adore having deep conversations with Taurus.
steps.content: Aquarius will adore having deep conversations with Taurus. Aquarius is a brilliant and highly cerebral sign. They need to make an intellectual match to be satisfied in a relationship—and Taurus can provide that. Smart, patient, and skilled at communication, Taurus can give Aquarius the stimulating exchanges they want in relationships. Aquarius loves to discuss their favorite activities and interests, which often involve quirky things like board games, technology, and innovation.

steps.title: Aquarius will appreciate Taurus’s steadfast loyalty.
steps.content: Aquarius will appreciate Taurus’s steadfast loyalty. Aquarius needs a partner who will listen to them talk and support their unconventional ideas. If Taurus keeps an open mind and lets Aquarius bounce thoughts off of them, Aquarius will be hooked. Thankfully, Taurus’s loyal nature means that they’ll be more than willing to hear Aquarius out and be committed to Aquarius for the long haul.

steps.title: Aquarius will be drawn to Taurus’s resourcefulness and sophistication.
steps.content: Aquarius will be drawn to Taurus’s resourcefulness and sophistication. Practical Taurus is an expert problem-solver, someone Aquarius can rely on when they need a second opinion or sounding board for their wild ideas. They may have different pursuits in life, but their natures aren’t so different; Taurus is also action-oriented and hard-working, which Aquarius will immediately respect. steps.title: Taurus can show Aquarius how to enjoy the finer things in life.
steps.content: Taurus can show Aquarius how to enjoy the finer things in life. Aquarius isn’t a materialistic sign—they’re all about ideas, dreams, and bringing change into the world. Meanwhile, Taurus values comfort, fine food, and money. With Taurus, Aquarius will be surprised to find that a little pampering once in a while feels nice—and a caring Taurus lives to treat their partner to luxurious experiences. Aquarius will also be glad to know that they don’t need to outdo themselves to make Taurus happy. Something as simple as a homecooked meal and a night of quality time will delight them!

steps.title: Aquarius can steer the relationship forward, which Taurus needs.
steps.content: Aquarius can steer the relationship forward, which Taurus needs. While Taurus is loyal to a fault, they’re also cautious, slow-moving, and even lazy at times when it comes to relationships. Because of this, Taurus needs a partner who can step up and keep things moving—and this is where the more fast-paced Aquarius can excel. Taurus will appreciate Aquarius’s ability to progress the relationship, as well as Aquarius’s directness. Taurus hates jumping through hoops for a relationship, and thankfully, Aquarius won’t make them.

steps.title: Taurus can explore new things and break from routine with Aquarius.
steps.content: Taurus can explore new things and break from routine with Aquarius. While Taurus instinctively shies away from change to the point that they can become stagnant, they’re a smart sign who appreciates learning new things—and Aquarius can show Taurus a whole new world. Aquarius’s sharp mind and plentiful knowledge will impress Taurus, and their curiosity will motivate Taurus to get outside their comfort zone.

steps.title: Aquarius is a visionary, and Taurus will admire their humanistic ideals.
steps.content: Aquarius is a visionary, and Taurus will admire their humanistic ideals. While Taurus is more materialistic than Aquarius, they can appreciate Aquarius’s desire to help the whole world (and not just their immediate social circle). As a helpful and compassionate sign, Taurus will be inspired by Aquarius’s lofty goals, and lend their help in accomplishing them. [2] X Trustworthy Source American Psychological Association Leading scientific and professional organization of licensed psychologists Go to source Aquarius tends to get fired up before they even make much headway with their goals, so a more even-tempered Taurus can keep Aquarius grounded while offering them encouragement.

steps.title: Both signs are fixed, and therefore known for their stubbornness.
steps.content: Both signs are fixed, and therefore known for their stubbornness. Fixed zodiac signs are the most driven of the zodiac—once they commit to something, they see it through to the end. Unfortunately, fixed signs are also stubborn! Taurus is thick-skinned and set in their ways, while intellectual Aquarius can be a know-it-all. Compromise is the key to making their relationship work. These signs can share a loving relationship if they learn to respect one another’s perspective and hear each other out before passing judgment. Reader Poll: We asked 826 wikiHow readers what the most negative traits in Taureans are, and 56% of them said stubbornness and resistance to change. [Take Poll] But an Aquarius might be able to deal with it because they understand what it's like to be stubborn.

steps.title: When they work together, they’re a force to be reckoned with.
steps.content: When they work together, they’re a force to be reckoned with. Aquarius is the creative dreamer of the pair, while Taurus is the hard worker. With Aquarius offering up outside-the-box ideas and Taurus using their practical planning skills to see those ideas through, there’s nothing they can’t achieve together. They also work well as a long-term pair if Taurus handles the day-to-day matters and Aquarius focuses on the big picture. Taurus loves to support their partner in practical ways, so they’ll be all too willing to help Aquarius make their dreams come true.

steps.title: These signs must be honest about their relationship expectations.
steps.content: These signs must be honest about their relationship expectations. Aquarius needs a ton of space and freedom, making Taurus jealous. Aquarius’s unpredictability will also bother Taurus, who craves a stable relationship. This can make trust difficult for the pair to maintain. However, these signs can find common ground when Taurus learns to forgive and stop controlling Aquarius, and Aquarius makes an effort to connect and empathize with Taurus.

steps.title: Aquarius likes to blend friendship and romance, and so does Taurus.
steps.content: Aquarius likes to blend friendship and romance, and so does Taurus. Friendship is highly important to both signs, and they typically develop romantic feelings for someone they’re already comfortable around. As such, both signs will immediately understand the other—and their friendship can lead to a vibrant, passionate relationship. When an Aquarius is crushing on a Taurus (or vice versa), leaning into the friendship can help seal the deal. Tauruses want to be with someone they’re already comfortable around, and the same goes for Aquarius!

steps.title: Taurus and Aquarius can keep one another balanced.
steps.content: Taurus and Aquarius can keep one another balanced. Taurus is ruled by Venus, the planet of love, pleasure, and passion. Aquarius is ruled by Uranus, the planet of change and progress. [3] X Research source If these signs respect their differences, Aquarius can keep the relationship fresh and exciting while Taurus can provide the warmth and stability needed for true love to blossom. Taurus and Aquarius move at different speeds. Taurus is more of a homebody while Aquarius loves to be outside exploring. However, if they meet in the middle and make time for both, they’ll never get bored of one another. Their values and attitudes are very different—Aquarius is detached and analytical, while Taurus is down-to-earth and materialistic. Nonetheless, both signs will find their differences fascinating! Rather than deterring them, Aquarius and Taurus will drift closer together, each determined to learn everything about the other.
